data.title: Profile for Andy Malis
data.text: Principal at Malis Consulting, and Partner at Interisle Consulting Group. Available for contracting in telecommunications and networking product and protocol development and related standardization. Extensive experience in networking protocol architecture and evolution, product architecture and strategic planning, service provider network planning, technology transfer, leadership in international standardization bodies (IETF, Broadband Forum, ITU-T, Open Networking Foundation, etc.), standards authorship, and chairing and speaking roles at conferences and other industry events. Previously, has held senior engineering positions at Futurewei Technologies (Huawei's USA R&D subsidiary), Verizon Communications, Tellabs, Vivace Networks, Ascom Nexion, Ascend Communications, Cascade Communications, Bolt Beranek and Newman, and MITRE.
